title: Kid Rock > John Lennon, QANON Donnie Brasco 1.27.22
itunes:title: Kid Rock > John Lennon, QANON Donnie Brasco 1.27.22
description:
In episode 1072, Jack and Miles are joined by journalist Amanda Moore to discuss Kid Rock has PWNED the left, Jan 6er had his GoT fandom used against him in court…, Amanda's Experience Covering the Far Right as an Undercover Journalist and more!

Listen: Boys With Toys by Gap Mangione
